headlines.title: Doechii blasts Trump administration’s ‘ruthless attacks’ in LA amid Ice raids
headlines.description: Rapper turns BET awards speech into call for justice after White House deployed military forces on demonstrators

headlines.title: Marchand, Bennett stay hot for Panthers in Game 3 of Stanley Cup Final
headlines.description: Honor roll, stock watch from Florida’s big win to take 2-1 series lead against Edmonton

headlines.title: Panthers dominate Oilers, chase Skinner in 6-1 Game 3 rout
headlines.description: The Panthers seized control of what had been a tight Stanley Cup Finals after two games, dominating the discombobulated Oilers 6-1 in Game 3.

headlines.title: Sly Stone, Maestro of a Multifaceted, Hitmaking Band, Dies at 82
headlines.description: Leading Sly and the Family Stone, he helped redefine the landscape of pop, funk and rock in the late 1960s and early ’70s.

headlines.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for June 10
headlines.description: Asian shares edged higher on Tuesday, buoyed by expectations about the US-China trade talks as officials struck a positive tone after the first day of negotiations.

headlines.title: Sean Diddy Combs' ex-girlfriend testifies about sexual violence
headlines.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs' ex-girlfriend says he forced her to have a “freak-off”-style sexual encounter with a male sex worker last year after chasing her around her California home, putting her in a chokehold, punching her in the face and kicking down doors.

headlines.title: BET Awards 2025: Live Coverage Of Culture's Biggest Night
headlines.description: The ceremony, hosted by comedian Kevin Hart, promises to be a star-studded affair.

headlines.title: Israel preparing to deport Gaza aid boat activists, including Greta Thunberg
headlines.description: The passengers from the Madleen were intercepted by Israeli forces on Monday and towed to the port of Ashdod

headlines.title: One dead in strike on Odesa maternity ward, officials say
headlines.description: Four were injured in the attack that hit medical and residential buildings, the Odesa Governor said.

headlines.title: HBO and CNN owner Warner Bros Discovery to split in two
headlines.description: The media giant will separate its studio and streaming business away from its cable TV networks.
